Annual meeting to support Korean reunification held in Cuba
articles.content:
Annual meeting to support Korean reunification held in Cuba
   Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- An annual meeting of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification was held at the building of the Cuban Institute of Friendship with the Peoples on March 31.Present there were Jesus Montana Oropesa, chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, and other figures of political and social circles and members of friendship organizations.  
   The meeting summed up last year's work and discussed a working  plan for this year.

articles.title: South Korea stages "Ssangryong 99" exercise
articles.content:
South Korea stages "Ssangryong 99" exercise
    Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The South Korean authorities staged a provocative "Ssangryong 99" war maneuver from April 13 to 16, according to a radio report from Seoul.They asserted that, during the period, the "Pyongjin" unit of the "ROK" army improved the capacity of carrying out a war duty in North Chungchong Province and the northern part of Kyonggi Province while examining the wartime mobilization system of the unit and its operation plan.   They hurled many "reservists" into the exercise to inspect their training.

articles.title: Greetings to Zimbabwean President
articles.content:
Greetings to Zimbabwean President
   Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to Zimbabwean President Robert G. Mugabe on April 14 on the occasion of the 19th anniversary of the foundation of  the Republic of Zimbabwe.   The message wished the Zimbabwean President and people success in their work to achieve country's development and prosperity and defend peace and expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to expand and develop.

articles.title: Chairman Jang Chol meets Mongolian guests
articles.content:
Chairman Jang Chol meets Mongolian guests 
    Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- Jang Chol, chairman of the organizing committee of the 17th April Spring Friendship Art Festival,  met and had a talk with a cultural delegation and leading members of  art troupe and acrobatic troupe of Mongolia at the Mansudae Assembly Hall on Saturday.

articles.title: Delegation of Revolution's Youth Union of Syria  welcomed
articles.content:
Delegation of Revolution's Youth Union of Syria  welcomed
    Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- A rally to welcome the delegation of the Revolution's Youth Union of Syria led by its vice-chairman Muhammad Imad al-Zououbi was held in Pyongyang on Saturday.    Present there were officials of the central committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and youth and students in the city.

articles.title: Anti-"government" struggle declared in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-"government" struggle declared in S. Korea
   Pyongyang, April 18 (KCNA) -- The South Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held meetings to declare an anti-"government"  general struggle simultaneously in 14 cities and provinces on Saturday, according to a radio report from Seoul.   Present there were more than 30,000 union members under the confederation including those of the Federation of Public  Transport and Service Trade Unions.   Participants announced that they would launch a powerful struggle unless  their demands including suspension of "restructuring" and lay-off, the building of a social security network and  guarantee of activities of its unions were met.
